transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning sir.
Executive: Haan ji, Praveen bol raha hu sir IndiaMART head office se, kaise hain?
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Haan sir keh raha hu ki buylead consume nahi ho pa rahi hai aapki.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan to usi ke regarding maine connect kiya. Sir ye batao ye oak wood plank wala product out of stock kiya hai kya?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Uh oak wood plank wala product.

Executive: Out of stock hai kya?
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold kar rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.

Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello, haan sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Kya?
Customer: Hello sir.
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello, kya ho raha hai hamare ghar mein?
summary:

- Buyleads are not being consumed.

- Asked if oak wood plank product is out of stock.

- Call put on hold.



Next Steps:
